data.text: It's so frustrating~……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>It's so frustrating~……!

data.text:
During the race, I messed up so many times! I couldn't run the 
way I wanted to at all……Aaaah, there's so much to reflect on……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>During the race, I messed up so many times! I couldn't run the 
<story>way I wanted to at all……Aaaah, there's so much to reflect on……!

data.text:
I think placing 3rd in your first G1 is a fantastic result though…… 
But I see, you aren't satisfied with this result.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I think placing 3rd in your first G1 is a fantastic result though…… 
<story>But I see, you aren't satisfied with this result.

data.text:
I think placing 3rd in your first G1 is a fantastic result though…… 
But I see, you aren't satisfied with this result.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I think placing 3rd in your first G1 is a fantastic result though…… 
<story>But I see, you aren't satisfied with this result.

data.text:
Yes! I'm nowhere near satisfied with this……! 
I can't be satisfied with this result!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yes! I'm nowhere near satisfied with this……! 
<story>I can't be satisfied with this result!

data.text:
I want to be able to get even better results. 
So I can become who I want to be……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I want to be able to get even better results. 
<story>So I can become who I want to be……!

data.text:
Yeah. I guess it would be becoming 
an 『Uma Musume that everyone looks up to』――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah. I guess it would be becoming 
<story>an 『Uma Musume that everyone looks up to』――

data.text:
……I really admire them. 
My senpais on the Triple Tiara route.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……I really admire them. 
<story>My senpais on the Triple Tiara route.

data.text:
Inspiration, courage, dreams…… 
Sparkly things like that are what my senpais have given me.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Inspiration, courage, dreams…… 
<story>Sparkly things like that are what my senpais have given me.

data.text:
『I want to run like that. I want to be strong, 
dazzling, and move people's hearts, just like that!』 
……Those are the inspirations they've given me.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>『I want to run like that. I want to be strong, 
<story>dazzling, and move people's hearts, just like that!』 
<story>……Those are the inspirations they've given me.

data.text:
I believe that's exactly what their senpais also gave to them…… 
and that's what I feel connects them all together.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I believe that's exactly what their senpais also gave to them…… 
<story>and that's what I feel connects them all together.

data.text:
That's why, with everything they've given me, 
I want to become part of that too. Next time, 
I want to be the one that inspires someone!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>That's why, with everything they've given me, 
<story>I want to become part of that too. Next time, 
<story>I want to be the one that inspires someone!

data.text:
……Having a lot to reflect on means that there's a 
lot of room to grow for next time. So you can become 
who you want to be, let's work hard, Kraft!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>……Having a lot to reflect on means that there's a 
<story>lot of room to grow for next time. So you can become 
<story>who you want to be, let's work hard, Kraft!

data.text:
Yeah! 
……Ah! But……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! 
<story>……Ah! But……!

data.text:
You can't just focus on me all the time though, right? 
Since next up, is Cesario's debut race……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>You can't just focus on me all the time though, right? 
<story>Since next up, is Cesario's debut race……!

data.text:
We have a lot of preparations to do before the end of 
next month, don't we? Cesario-san, are you prepared?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>We have a lot of preparations to do before the end of 
<story>next month, don't we? Cesario-san, are you prepared?

data.text:
Of course. ……Trainer, 
you don't have to hold back one bit, I'm looking forward to it.
data.name: Cesario

choices.text: Right, I got it. We'll go for it!
Right, I got it. We'll go for it!

data.processed:
<story>Of course. ……Trainer, 
<story>you don't have to hold back one bit, I'm looking forward to it.

data.text:
And so, December 25th, a Christmas debut, approached. 
Cesario was――
data.processed:
<story>And so, December 25th, a Christmas debut, approached. 
<story>Cesario was――

data.text: Huu, huuu……Haaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Huu, huuu……Haaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
With 200m left, Cesario pulls away! 
Now the lead has changed to Cesario! It's Cesario!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>With 200m left, Cesario pulls away! 
<story>Now the lead has changed to Cesario! It's Cesario!!

data.text:
Goal!! First place is Cesario, it's Cesario! 
She marks her debut with a spectacular victory!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Goal!! First place is Cesario, it's Cesario! 
<story>She marks her debut with a spectacular victory!!

data.text:
Cesario! Good work in your debut. 
Congrats on 1st place! It was a really good run……!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Cesario! Good work in your debut. 
<story>Congrats on 1st place! It was a really good run……!

data.text:
esario! Good work in your debut. 
Congrats on 1st place! It was a really good run……!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>esario! Good work in your debut. 
<story>Congrats on 1st place! It was a really good run……!

data.text:
Trainer……thank you very much for the words of praise. 
……However, all I've done is just finish my first race.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Trainer……thank you very much for the words of praise. 
<story>……However, all I've done is just finish my first race.

data.text:
I intend to continue doing my best without letting my guard down, 
so I'll leave it to you to keep up the strict guidance.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I intend to continue doing my best without letting my guard down, 
<story>so I'll leave it to you to keep up the strict guidance.

data.text:
Even though she just won, without even a smile on her 
face, Cesario bowed her head. She was an Uma Musume 
who embodied the concept of stoicism and fortitude……!
data.processed:
<story>Even though she just won, without even a smile on her 
<story>face, Cesario bowed her head. She was an Uma Musume 
<story>who embodied the concept of stoicism and fortitude……!

data.text:
Okay, well then! Merry Christmas♪ 
Ah, I baked a cake so, is it fine if I start cutting it?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Okay, well then! Merry Christmas♪ 
<story>Ah, I baked a cake so, is it fine if I start cutting it?

data.text:
I was busy with preparation for my debut race so I 
left it all to you, but I really wanted to do something……
Truthfully, I really love making sweets!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>I was busy with preparation for my debut race so I 
<story>left it all to you, but I really wanted to do something……
<story>Truthfully, I really love making sweets!

data.text:
Fufu, for this one~…… I even put some Santa-san candies on top 
of it……since it's an opportunity, King-san! Please have some♪
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Fufu, for this one~…… I even put some Santa-san candies on top 
<story>of it……since it's an opportunity, King-san! Please have some♪

data.text:
……Night time after her debut race. To coincide with that, 
Team <Ascella> was holding a Christmas party, but――
data.processed:
<story>……Night time after her debut race. To coincide with that, 
<story>Team <Ascella> was holding a Christmas party, but――

data.text: ……Wait, wait. Wait just a minute――!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>……Wait, wait. Wait just a minute――!

data.text: Who are you!?!?
data.name: Teammates
data.processed: <story>Who are you!?!?

data.text:
Ahaha! Oh come on, it's Cesario obviously~! 
Yay, yay, Cesario's cake~! I've been looking forward to it~♪
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! Oh come on, it's Cesario obviously~! 
<story>Yay, yay, Cesario's cake~! I've been looking forward to it~♪

data.text:
Be careful not to get cream on your nose again, Kraft. 
Ah, Trainer too, do you have any favorite fruits?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Be careful not to get cream on your nose again, Kraft. 
<story>Ah, Trainer too, do you have any favorite fruits?

data.text:
Really……are you really Cesario……!? How should I put it, 
um, you have a completely different aura about you……!?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Really……are you really Cesario……!? How should I put it, 
<story>um, you have a completely different aura about you……!?

data.text:
Really……are you really Cesario……!? How should I put it, 
um, you have a completely different aura about you……!?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Really……are you really Cesario……!? How should I put it, 
<story>um, you have a completely different aura about you……!?

data.text:
Ah……now that you mention it, ever since I joined 
the team I've just been so focused the whole time…… 
I guess this is the first time I've really relaxed?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Ah……now that you mention it, ever since I joined 
<story>the team I've just been so focused the whole time…… 
<story>I guess this is the first time I've really relaxed?

data.text:
Cesario is someone who has a really 
drastic on-off switch, you see~!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Cesario is someone who has a really 
<story>drastic on-off switch, you see~!

data.text:
No, is this really the same dimension 
as a simple on-off switch……?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>No, is this really the same dimension 
<story>as a simple on-off switch……?

data.text:
A party with the team, filled with unexpected surprises. 
As the boisterous, joyful laughs continued, Christmas 
night eventually started drawing to a close……
data.processed:
<story>A party with the team, filled with unexpected surprises. 
<story>As the boisterous, joyful laughs continued, Christmas 
<story>night eventually started drawing to a close……

data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text:
Fufu……King-san's laying on the sofa, out like a light~. 
She didn't even wake up when Trainer-san moved her.
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Fufu……King-san's laying on the sofa, out like a light~. 
<story>She didn't even wake up when Trainer-san moved her.

data.text:
All the way up until today, she was working really hard to plan 
this party after all……She's a really good team leader, isn't she?
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>All the way up until today, she was working really hard to plan 
<story>this party after all……She's a really good team leader, isn't she?

data.text:
You're right. But, hopefully she doesn't catch a cold like this…… 
Trainer, do you have anything that can be used as a blanket?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>You're right. But, hopefully she doesn't catch a cold like this…… 
<story>Trainer, do you have anything that can be used as a blanket?

data.text:
Let's see……Ah, my coat is on that hangar over 
there, so can you use that? Thanks, Cesario.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Let's see……Ah, my coat is on that hangar over 
<story>there, so can you use that? Thanks, Cesario.

data.text:
Let's see……Ah, my coat is on that hangar over 
there, so can you use that? Thanks, Cesario.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Let's see……Ah, my coat is on that hangar over 
<story>there, so can you use that? Thanks, Cesario.

data.text:
No problem. ……Oh, huh? Excuse me, 
these were under your coat, is this……?
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>No problem. ……Oh, huh? Excuse me, 
<story>these were under your coat, is this……?

data.text:
I was planning on giving them out later……they're 
presents for everyone. It's nothing too fancy though.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I was planning on giving them out later……they're 
<story>presents for everyone. It's nothing too fancy though.

data.text:
I was planning on giving them out later……they're 
presents for everyone. It's nothing too fancy though.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I was planning on giving them out later……they're 
<story>presents for everyone. It's nothing too fancy though.

data.text:
Eh, from Trainer-san!? Waaaaah-……!! 
Thank you very much-!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Eh, from Trainer-san!? Waaaaah-……!! 
<story>Thank you very much-!

data.text:
Trainer……I'm sorry, 
I probably should have prepared something too.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Trainer……I'm sorry, 
<story>I probably should have prepared something too.

data.text:
……can we just say that my debut win is your present 
for now? Can you forgive me with that for now? Fufuu.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>……can we just say that my debut win is your present 
<story>for now? Can you forgive me with that for now? Fufuu.

data.text:
(……once more I can't help but think that Kraft and Cesario are both 
really kind. Not only that, but they're both really talented……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(……once more I can't help but think that Kraft and Cesario are both 
<story>really kind. Not only that, but they're both really talented……)

data.text:
(……once more I can't help but think that Kraft and Cesario are both 
really kind. Not only that, but they're both really talented……)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(……once more I can't help but think that Kraft and Cesario are both 
<story>really kind. Not only that, but they're both really talented……)

data.text:
(But, when I remember that……I can't help but 
be more curious. Why did these two choose a team 
like <Ascella> which was already on the decline?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(But, when I remember that……I can't help but 
<story>be more curious. Why did these two choose a team 
<story>like <Ascella> which was already on the decline?)

data.text:
(But, when I remember that……I can't help but 
be more curious. Why did these two choose a team 
like <Ascella> which was already on the decline?)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(But, when I remember that……I can't help but 
<story>be more curious. Why did these two choose a team 
<story>like <Ascella> which was already on the decline?)

data.text:
If there was some kind of meaning behind it, 
I should learn about it for the future. Thinking 
that, I asked them after training one day.
data.processed:
<story>If there was some kind of meaning behind it, 
<story>I should learn about it for the future. Thinking 
<story>that, I asked them after training one day.

data.text: When I did, they both looked at each other and smiled, then――
data.processed: <story>When I did, they both looked at each other and smiled, then――

data.text: ……we thought it couldn't be anyone else but you.
data.name: Kraft & Cesario
data.processed: <story>……we thought it couldn't be anyone else but you.
